uk.ac.ox.comlab.diadem.oxpath.utils
Class Utils

java.lang.Object
  uk.ac.ox.comlab.diadem.oxpath.utils.Utils

public final class Utils
extends java.lang.Object

Class containing static helper methods for the web access layer. In each method, the first explicit parameter in the signature is intended to become the implicit parameter in the interfaces in diadem.common.web.dom.

This class, along with the interfaces in diadem.common.web.dom comprise the web access layer for OXPath. The methods in this class are intended to be transferred to the DIADEM API.

Author:
AndrewJSel

Constructor Detail

Utils

public Utils()
Method Detail

compareDocumentPosition

public char compareDocumentPosition(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMNode iThis,
                                    diadem.common.web.dom.DOMNode other)
                             throws org.w3c.dom.DOMException
Compares the document order of the implicit parameter to the explicit parameter. The output matches that of the compareDocumentPosition(other) method in the DOM Specification (which returns an unsigned short with mask defined with constants in the Node interface).

Parameters:
iThis - The first DOM node to compare to the other parameter
other - The other DOM node to compare to the implicit parameter
Returns:
an unsigned short with mask defined with constants in the Node interface of the DOM Specification
Throws:
org.w3c.dom.DOMException - if the two nodes are from different documents (and therefore, not comparable)

compareTo

public static int compareTo(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMNode iThis,
                            diadem.common.web.dom.DOMNode other)
Takes the result of {DOMNode.compareDocumentOrder} and formats the result as a Java Comparable. Required for Java Comparable<OXPathWebAccessNode> implementation, behaving like a standard Java comparable. Natural order for comparison is determined by document order.

Parameters:
iThis - The first DOM node to compare to the other parameter
other - The other DOM node to compare to the other parameter
Returns:
int value as expected in a standard Java Comparable, based on document order: returns <0 if this appears before o in the document, >0 if this appears after o in the document, and 0 if this and o are the same node.

isSelectElement

public static boolean isSelectElement(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement iThis)
Determines if the input parameter is an HTML select element

Parameters:
iThis - the input parameter
Returns:
true if iThis is a select element, false otherwise

getOptions

public static diadem.common.web.dom.DOMNodeList getOptions(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement iThis)
Returns the options for the given node (only useful for select elements)

Parameters:
iThis - input parameter to check for available options
Returns:
a list of options for the given node; returns empty if the select element has no options or if the input parameter is not a select element

getSelectedOptions

public static diadem.common.web.dom.DOMNodeList getSelectedOptions(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement iThis)
Returns the selected options for the given node (only useful for select elements)

Parameters:
iThis - input parameter to check for selected options.
Returns:
a list of options for the given node; returns empty if the select element has no options or if the input parameter is not a select element

public static boolean setSelectedAttribute(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement iThis,
                                           diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement optionValue,
                                           boolean isSelected)
Sets the option element optionValue, for the given select element, to the value of isSelected.

Parameters:
iThis - select element containing optionValue
optionValue - option element contained in the iThis
isSelected - true to select optionValue, false to deselect
Returns:

focus

public static void focus(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement iThis)
Puts the focus on the input element

Parameters:
iThis - the input element to put the focus

getPage

public static diadem.common.web.dom.DOMDocument getPage(diadem.common.web.WebBrowser iThis,
                                                        java.lang.String url)
Fetches the page located at the input url into the given web browser. Complements #WebBrowser.getDOMWalker(), but returns the fetched page (with blocking).

Parameters:
iThis - web browser object to load page
url - fully-formed url (including protocol) to specify web page to load
Returns:
loaded web page returned by url consistent with the OXPathWebAccessPage interface

getCurrentWindow

public static DOMWindow getCurrentWindow(diadem.common.web.WebBrowser iThis)
Returns the window with the current focus

Parameters:
web - window with current focus
Returns:
web window with the current focus

closeWindow

public static void closeWindow(diadem.common.web.WebBrowser iThis,
                               DOMWindow window)
Closes the page (removing references for garbage collection, etc.) to free up memory after page access is finished

Parameters:
iThis - web browser object
page - reference to web page to be closed

Returns a list of pages currently open by the browser (in memory); list order is unspecified.

Parameters:
iThis - web browser object
Returns:
List object containing all open web windows

Simulates right clicking on a element and selecting Open in new tab (or, alternatively, ctrl-click). Focus transfers to new page.

Parameters:
iThis - focus element
Returns:
The newly open window

setCacheSize

                                java.lang.Double size)

Parameters:

fireEvent

public static diadem.common.web.dom.DOMDocument fireEvent(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement iThis,
                                                          DOMEvent event)
Fires any of the DOM 3 events, with context node of the implicit parameter. Event is expected to be fired with blocking. This method is critical, as all remaining action methods can be implemented from it (with the exception of type).

Parameters:
iThis - focus element
event - input DOM 3 event
Returns:
Page resulting after action. Per OXPath data model, this is a new page. However, browser optimization in the web access layer can return the same page if this is appropriate.

type

public static diadem.common.web.dom.DOMDocument type(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMElement iThis,
                                                     java.lang.String input)
Simulates typing (with keystrokes, not copying and pasting) the input buffer. Fires all necessary events (esp. textInput) and uses blocking.

Parameters:
iThis - focus element
input - text to be typed with the implicit parameter as focus
Returns:
Page resulting after action. Per OXPath data model, this is a new page. However, browser optimization in the web access layer can return the same page if this is appropriate.

getAttributes

public static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getAttributes(diadem.common.web.dom.DOMNode iThis)
Determines all attributes and returns all names and values

Parameters:
iThis - context node
Returns:
Map object with keys of attributes names mapped to their values

Parameters:
iThis - focus element
Returns:
